duties_responsibilities.duty: Biblically and theologically synthesize the beliefs of a ministry organization, person, materials, websites, and social media sites to ensure the highest integrity and excellence of the content and partnerships through vetting.
Present findings to the Content Advisory Board.
Maintain constant awareness of Christian cultural trends and societal movements, and their intersection with a Christian worldview.
Prepare discussion topics for listeners and lead departmental devotionals.
Lead Prayer Time for EMF Team Members.
Ensure compliance with the organization's Statement of Faith and Mission/Vision.
Lead departmental devotionals, participate in event and outreach initiatives, and contribute to the growth of the EMF Ministry Department.
Develop and maintain inventory of position statements for ministry, equip ministry and teach on vetting practices and approaches, and track and monitor vetting approvals.
Grow in depth of scripture and biblical knowledge and apply it in response to EMF audience needs.

education_certification.credential: Master of Divinity (MDiv) Degree or another applicable degree from an accredited educational institution.
